entry.title: Card 7
entry.content:
• At Startup Weekend Vancouver 2014, I joined My Green Space team as a UI designer and won 2nd place.
  • At CODE 2015 hackathon, I joined Padawans team as a UI designer. Selected as one of the top 15 teams among 1300+ participants.
entry.summary: At Startup Weekend Vancouver 2014, I joined My Green Space team as a UI designer and won 2nd place. At CODE 2015 hackathon, I joined Padawans team as a UI designer. Selected as one of the top 15 teams among 1300+ participants.

entry.title: Card 6
entry.content:
• I’m a mentor at Ladies Learning Code and teach HTML/CSS to beginner women developers.
  • I spoke twice at Code & Coffee, a local coding meetup. The video/slides can be found on Medium.
  • I was an organizer and a speaker at Women Who Code Tokyo.
  • I like posting videos on YouTube to share my experience and knowledge.
entry.summary: I’m a mentor at Ladies Learning Code and teach HTML/CSS to beginner women developers. I spoke twice at Code & Coffee, a local coding meetup. The video/slides can be found on Medium. I was an organizer and a speaker at Women Who Code Tokyo. I like posting videos on YouTube to share my experience and knowledge.

entry.title: Card 5
entry.content:
Here are some of my open source projects:

  • ResumeCards: Markdown-based resume generator (590+ stars)
  • Twemoji Awesome: Like font awesome, but for Twitter Emoji (540+ stars)
  • Purplecoat.js: Simple JS library for labeled overlays (790+ stars)
  • Shiori: Bootstrap-based Jekyll Theme (250+ stars)
entry.summary: Here are some of my open source projects:

entry.title: Card 4
entry.content: BizReach is Japan’s top job site exclusive to business executives. I worked on front-end design and coding. My most recent project was Bizreach Woman, a job site specifically for female business executives in Japan.
entry.summary: BizReach is Japan’s top job site exclusive to business executives. I worked on front-end design and coding. My most recent project was Bizreach Woman, a job site specifically for female business executives in Japan.

entry.title: Card 3
entry.content: Istuary Innovation Group is Canada’s largest technology incubation platform. I was in the OPI team which makes HR systems for Istuary, and I worked on front-end coding (HTML/CSS) and design (Sketch).
entry.summary: Istuary Innovation Group is Canada’s largest technology incubation platform. I was in the OPI team which makes HR systems for Istuary, and I worked on front-end coding (HTML/CSS) and design (Sketch).

entry.title: Card 2
entry.content: Actcat is making an automated code reviewing service called SideCI, and supporting engineers to write clean and maintainable code. I was a product designer and worked full-time from my place in Canada.
entry.summary: Actcat is making an automated code reviewing service called SideCI, and supporting engineers to write clean and maintainable code. I was a product designer and worked full-time from my place in Canada.

entry.title: Card 1
entry.content: Glass Canvas is a creative studio in Fort Langley. I’m contributing as a Frontend Developer and making websites/web applications to support great and inspiring organizations for changing our culture for the better.
